data.comment: The big names in today's match at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
In the minute 9, Goal! Alkmaar have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Zakaria Aboukhlal.
Great play from Jesper Karlsson to set up the goal.
Goal! Alkmaar extend their lead to 0-2 through Dani De Wit.
In the minute 14, Jesper Karlsson with an assist there.
Zakaria Aboukhlal puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-3.
Goal! Dani De Wit extends Alkmaar's lead to 0-4 in Rotterdam with a header.
In the minute 33, Fredrik Midtsjo instrumental with a fine assist.
An attacking Alkmaar player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Teun Koopmeiners (Alkmaar) has missed a penalty!
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
Henk Fraser is making the team's first substitution at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel with Dirk Abels replacing Jeffry Fortes.
In the minute 46, Sven Mijnans is replacing Bryan Smeets for Sparta at Sparta Stadium Het Kasteel.
Marco Bizot (Alkmaar) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Abdou Harroui pulls one back for Sparta to make it 1-4.
In the minute 57, That's a fine assist from Deroy Duarte.
Myron Boadu (Alkmaar) has received a yellow card from Danny Makkelie.
Goal! The home team reduce the deficit to 2-4 through a strike by Dirk Abels. .
In the minute 64, Great play from Sven Mijnans to set up the goal.
Zakaria Aboukhlal for Alkmaar has been booked by Danny Makkelie and receives a first yellow card.
Danzell Gravenberch is replacing Emanuel Emegha for the home team.
In the minute 74, Aaron Meijers is on a sub for Deroy Duarte for Sparta.
Alkmaar make their first substitution with Ramon Leeuwin replacing Pantelis Chatzidiakos.
The away team have replaced Jesper Karlsson with Hakon Evjen. This is the second substitution made today by Arne Slot.
In the minute 81, The home team replace Adil Auassar with Laros Duarte.
Arne Slot (Alkmaar) is making a third substitution, with Ferdy Druijf replacing Myron Boadu.
In the minute 86, Penalty! Danny Makkelie points to the spot, great chance for Sparta...
Marco Bizot (Alkmaar) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
The away team have replaced Zakaria Aboukhlal with Hobie Verhulst. This is the fourth substitution made today by Arne Slot.
Goal! Lennart Thy nets a penalty for Sparta. They now trail 3-4.
Danny Makkelie blows to end the match. The final score is 4-4.
Sven Mijnans levels the score at 4-4.
Sven Mijnans is booked for the home team.
